declarations.name: wb-card
declarations.description: Base card component. IS-A article, HAS-A header, main, footer.

declarations.name: wb-cardimage
declarations.description: Card with featured image and optional title/subtitle

declarations.name: wb-cardvideo
declarations.description: Card with embedded video player

declarations.name: wb-cardprofile
declarations.description: Simple profile card. INHERITS from card.base (IS-A card), CONTAINS profile elements (HAS-A avatar, name, role, bio, cover).

declarations.name: wb-cardpricing
declarations.description: Pricing tier card with plan name, price, features list, and CTA

declarations.name: wb-cardproduct
declarations.description: E-commerce product card with image, price, rating, and CTA

declarations.name: wb-cardstats
declarations.description: Statistics display card with value, label, icon, and trend indicator

attributes.name: data-label
attributes.description: Label describing what the value represents

declarations.name: wb-cardtestimonial
declarations.description: Customer testimonial/review card with quote, author, avatar, and rating

declarations.name: wb-cardhero
declarations.description: Hero banner with background image, title, subtitle, and optional CTA

attributes.name: data-overlay
attributes.description: Show gradient overlay for text readability

declarations.name: wb-cardfile
declarations.description: File display card with icon, name, size, and download

type.text: pdf | doc | image | video | audio | zip | file

declarations.name: wb-cardnotification
declarations.description: Dismissible notification card with type-based styling

declarations.name: wb-cardportfolio
declarations.description: Professional portfolio/profile card with cover, avatar, bio, contact, and social

attributes.name: data-social
attributes.description: Social links as JSON [{name, url, icon}]

declarations.name: wb-cardlink
declarations.description: Clickable card that navigates to a URL

declarations.name: wb-cardhorizontal
declarations.description: Card with horizontal layout - image on side, content on other

declarations.name: wb-cardoverlay
declarations.description: Card with text overlaid on background image

attributes.name: data-gradient
attributes.description: Show gradient overlay for text readability

declarations.name: wb-cardbutton
declarations.description: Card with action buttons in footer

declarations.name: wb-cardexpandable
declarations.description: Card with collapsible/expandable content section

declarations.name: wb-cardminimizable
declarations.description: Card with minimize/expand toggle button in header

declarations.name: wb-carddraggable
declarations.description: Card that can be dragged around the page

declarations.name: wb-spinner
declarations.description: Loading spinner indicator

declarations.name: wb-avatar
declarations.description: User avatar with image, initials fallback, and status indicator

attributes.name: data-name
attributes.description: Full name (generates initials if not provided)

declarations.name: wb-badge
declarations.description: Small label/tag for status indicators, counts, or categories

type.text: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | error | info

attributes.name: data-pill
attributes.description: Pill shape with full border radius

declarations.name: wb-alert
declarations.description: Alert component for displaying messages with severity levels

attributes.name: data-dismissible
attributes.description: Show close button to dismiss alert

declarations.name: wb-progress
declarations.description: Progress bar with determinate and indeterminate states

type.text: default | primary | success | warning | error | info

declarations.name: wb-rating
declarations.description: Star rating component for displaying or collecting ratings

declarations.name: wb-tabs
declarations.description: Tab navigation for switching between content panels

declarations.name: wb-switch
declarations.description: Toggle switch for boolean settings

declarations.name: wb-grid
declarations.description: WB Framework grid component

declarations.name: wb-flex
declarations.description: WB Framework flex component

declarations.name: wb-stack
declarations.description: WB Framework stack component

declarations.name: wb-cluster
declarations.description: WB Framework cluster component

declarations.name: wb-container
declarations.description: WB Framework container component

declarations.name: wb-sidebar
declarations.description: WB Framework sidebarlayout component

declarations.name: wb-center
declarations.description: WB Framework center component

declarations.name: wb-cover
declarations.description: WB Framework cover component

declarations.name: wb-masonry
declarations.description: WB Framework masonry component

declarations.name: wb-switcher
declarations.description: WB Framework switcher component

declarations.name: wb-reel
declarations.description: WB Framework reel component

declarations.name: wb-frame
declarations.description: WB Framework frame component

declarations.name: wb-sticky
declarations.description: Makes element stick to viewport on scroll

declarations.name: wb-drawer
declarations.description: Collapsible sidebar layout with toggle

declarations.name: wb-icon
declarations.description: WB Framework icon component

declarations.name: wb-span
declarations.description: A generic inline container for applying utility classes and variants. Useful for traffic lights (window controls), badges, and status indicators.

type.text: red | yellow | green | dot | primary | secondary | success | error | warning | info

declarations.name: wb-control
declarations.description: WB Framework control component

declarations.name: wb-repeater
declarations.description: WB Framework repeater component

declarations.name: wb-mdhtml
declarations.description: Renders Markdown content as HTML, either from inline content or external source

declarations.name: wb-codecontrol
declarations.description: Interactive code editor/viewer control.

declarations.name: wb-collapse
declarations.description: Collapsible content area.

declarations.name: wb-darkmode
declarations.description: Button to toggle dark/light theme.

declarations.name: wb-dropdown
declarations.description: Toggleable dropdown menu

declarations.name: wb-footer
declarations.description: Page footer with copyright, links, and social icons

declarations.name: wb-header
declarations.description: Page header with logo, title, and optional navigation

declarations.name: wb-globe
declarations.description: 3D Globe visualization.

declarations.name: wb-stagelight
declarations.description: Versatile stage lighting effects including spotlights, beams, and fixtures.

attributes.name: data-color
attributes.description: Color of the light (hex, rgb, or named)

attributes.name: data-target
attributes.description: Selector for element to track (for spotlight/fixture)
